1.2...

THIS CRIMINAL MISC. CASE HAVING COME UP FOR ADMISSION ON

09.01.2019, THE COURT ON THE SAME DAY PASSED THE

FOLLOWING:

ORDER
Petition filed under Section 482 Cr.P.C.

2. The petitioner claims to be the owner of a
vehicle seized by the second respondent on the
allegation of commission of the offence under
the provisions of the Kerala Conservation of
Paddy Land and Wet Land Act. The seizure has
not been reported to the learned magistrate.
The prayer is to direct the second respondent
to report the seizure to the learned
magistrate concerned.

3. Heard the learned counsel for the petitioner
and the learned Public Prosecutor.

4. The petitioner may file an application under
Section 457 Cr.P.C. before the competent
court, which shall call for a report from the
second respondent and pass appropriate orders
